Cougar Families,
Today, the State of Oregon released new return to school metrics. These metrics are done county by county, and if your county does not meet these metrics regarding COVID-19 positive test rates, schools in the county may not provided onsite instruction for all students. It is a very detailed plan, although there are still a great number of unanswered questions.
What we do know, is that like all other Umatilla County schools, it does not appear that we will be able to start school with in person instruction this August. On-line instruction will look very different than it did in the spring, and will be much more structured and interactive. Please be patient with us as a district, and be assured that we will be providing more information in the coming days.

Thank You!
